name: Telegram Forwarder Bot
description: Telegram bot to forward messages automaticaly

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env variables.

API_KEY.description: Your bot API KEY, get this value from @BotFather.

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID.

FROM_CHATS.description: List of chat id's to forward messages from.

TO_CHATS.description: List of chat id's to forward messages to

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode messages.

CAPTION.description: If you want to add a caption to the forwarded file, enter it here

FILTER_TYPE.description: Type Of filters {document , audio , photo , video , animation , (empty = forward all kind of messages)}

URL.description: The URL your webhook should connect to (only needed for webhook mode).

PORT.description: Port to listen on for webhooks.

CERT_PATH.description: Path to certificate file (leave it blank if you don't know).

WORKERS.description: Number of threads to use, this depends on usage.  4 is the recommended (and default) amount, but your experience may vary.
